title: Amazon SQS Integration With Amazon Redshift using Amazon EventBridge Pipes
description: How to send messages from Amazon SQS queue to Amazon Redshift cluster using Amazon EventBridge Pipes

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The solution will create two Amazon SQS queues, Amazon Redshift Cluster, and an EventBridge Pipes to connect it all. EventBridge pipes consumer for messages source SQS queue
then transform the SQS message to create insert queries from data within message and insert data to Amazon Redshift cluster and add the SQS messages
See the README in the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Rajat Palod
authors.bio: Rajat is a Technical Account Manager at AWS and Serverless enthusiast.
